text: Euphorbia adenopoda is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Flora of Madagascar adenopoda Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia adenopoda
